attributes.additional_details: people who own a passport have not been able to travel for over a year internationally because of the government lockdowns and have lost out on using their passports. Therefore I would like the government to give extensions to people’s passports . For example if someone has 1 year left on a passport until it expires they should be given a 1 year extension or longer depending on how long people are restricted from using their passports
attributes.background: I would like the government to give extensions on passports

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend UK Passport expiry date by 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574804

Extend the expiry date on UK passports due to Coronavirus lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570528
